text:
Hi all :raised_hands:

We are giving out free access (early user licenses) to *content collaboration and management software* that lets content teams and stakeholders work on content creation on a single platform. *Please PM me if you’d like the free platform access.* 

*Here's the tool - <https://narrato.io/content-workflow-management-software>*

Typical uses cases - content marketing team can consolidate and track all content creation operations; manage writers/editors - assign tasks/deadlines/send for review etc; content team and stakeholders collaborate/work on one platform, deliver work to clients (agency use case). 

Content editor (where writing gets done) has readability, advanced language and structuring suggestions, plagiarism check (and SEO/keyword optimization feature, direct publishing to WP coming soon).

attachments.title: Narrato WorkSpace - Content Workflow & Management Software
attachments.text: Narrato Workspace is a content collaboration & management platform that brings all your content processes and people at one place, and helps you automate content workflow.
attachments.fallback: Narrato WorkSpace - Content Workflow & Management Software
